alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Massac (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 1:24PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Massac and southern Johnson Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 123 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Karnak, or near Vienna, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Massac and southern Johnson Counties, including the following locations... Belknap. This includes Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 18 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
